summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 14.4°C), outside temperature (down 11.6°C), and inside temperature (down 1.5°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 11238 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15831 lux), the amount of wind (up 21 miles), and cloud levels (up 434 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; cold spells are likely. Also, dry air conditions likely prevail and slight breezes. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and overcast conditions will limit sunlight. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
